破译氨基酸如何控制酵母细胞生长和自噬氨基酸是生命的基石。我们从吃的食物中获取它们，身体用它们来制造蛋白质，而蛋白质又用于生长、发育和许多其他功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Deciphering-how-amino-acids-control-cell-growth-and-autophagy-in-yeast.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Deciphering-how-amino-acids-control-cell-growth-and-autophagy-in-yeast.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=119d1ba2-48a5-475e-8d88-49acfdb22a65 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 05:51:22 -0500 Deciphering how amino acids control cell growth and autophagy in yeast
UKHSA 和 ONS 发布最新冬季 CIS 数据冬季 CIS 由英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 和国家统计局 (ONS) 于 2023 年 11 月联合推出，旨在提供实时患病率和阳性数据，以帮助监测社区中的 COVID-19 并帮助了解NHS 的冬季压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/UKHSA-and-ONS-publish-latest-Winter-CIS-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/UKHSA-and-ONS-publish-latest-Winter-CIS-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83e57069-06c6-45f8-a9ad-552e8a46fa64 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 05:44:12 -0500 UKHSA and ONS publish latest Winter CIS data
阿片类药物定居点的一年：您需要了解的 5 件事今年，约 15 亿美元已流入州和地方政府的金库，这些资金来自法院与十几家生产、销售或分销处方止痛药的公司达成的和解，这些公司因助长阿片类药物危机而被起诉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/The-year-in-opioid-settlements-5-things-you-need-to-know.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/The-year-in-opioid-settlements-5-things-you-need-to-know.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56a35f8f-6997-45b7-91cb-fd1c1084edfb Thu, 21 Dec 2023 05:37:41 -0500 The year in opioid settlements: 5 things you need to know
五角大楼清理数十年 PFAS 污染的缓慢而痛苦的努力密歇根州奥斯科达是第一个发现“永久化学物质”从军事设施渗入周围社区的社区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Inside-the-Pentagone28099s-painously-slow-effort-to-clean-up-decades-of-PFAS-contamination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Inside-the-Pentagone28099s-painously-slow-effort-to-clean-up-decades-of-PFAS-contamination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbaf8034-e8ee-434a-a765-87b730dad11c Thu, 21 Dec 2023 05:33:08 -0500 Inside the Pentagon’s painfully slow effort to clean up decades of PFAS contamination
诉讼和记录中暴露出 FDA 对医疗器械和患者伤害的监管存在严重缺陷小卡尔顿·“皮威”·高特尼 (Carlton "PeeWee" Gautney Jr.) 患有糖尿病，他依靠一副扑克牌大小的数字设备将胰岛素泵入血液中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Deep-flaws-in-FDA-oversight-of-medical-devices-and-病人-harm-expose-in-lawsuits-and-records.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Deep-flaws-in-FDA-oversight-of-medical-devices-and-病人-harm-expose-in-lawsuits-and-records.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15d3225c-1dd8-450a-9dec-503d87ac1a83 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 05:30:17 -0500 Deep flaws in FDA oversight of medical devices, and patient harm, exposed in lawsuits and records
JUNE Medical 的 Galaxy II® 自固式手术牵开器因其高品质和安全性获得 MDR 认证JUNE Medical 自豪地宣布，其 Galaxy II® 自固式手术牵开器已获得 BSI 集团的医疗器械法规（MDR - 法规 (EU) 2017/745）认证，可在欧盟使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/JUNE-Medicale28099s-Galaxy-IIc2ae-self-retaining-surgical-retractor-receives-MDR-certification-for-its-high-quality-and-safety。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/JUNE-Medicale28099s-Galaxy-IIc2ae-self-retaining-surgical-retractor-receives-MDR-certification-for-its-high-quality-and-safety。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3146f643-e963-43fe-863f-3653395a7b8b Thu, 21 Dec 2023 00:08:00 -0500 JUNE Medical’s Galaxy II® self-retaining surgical retractor receives MDR certification for its high quality and safety
巴西审查探索晚期霍奇金淋巴瘤的新兴疗法2023 年 12 月 12 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的综述论文，题为“巴西难治性或复发性经典霍奇金淋巴瘤治疗的当前观点：平衡疗效、安全性和耐受性”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Brazilian-review-explores-emerging-therapies-for-advanced-Hodgkin-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Brazilian-review-explores-emerging-therapies-for-advanced-Hodgkin-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699898de-91b8-4cb9-89e1-902d7823f4b9 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 20:06:00 -0500 Brazilian review explores emerging therapies for advanced Hodgkin lymphoma
研究指出 senolytic 药物是对抗肺气肿的潜在武器一篇新的研究论文发表在 Aging（被 MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 的“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 23 期，题为“贝尼地平钙通道阻滞剂促进死亡香烟烟雾诱导的衰老细胞并改善肺气肿。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-points-to-senolytic-drugs-as-潜在-weapon-against-lung-emphysema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-points-to-senolytic-drugs-as-潜在-weapon-against-lung-emphysema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=827dbcd6-fc59-40f8-8c7b-92de8d49d5ff Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:59:00 -0500 Study points to senolytic drugs as potential weapon against lung emphysema
足球与白质标记以外的更多脑损伤有关与那些不踢足球的人相比，前橄榄球运动员的大脑白质损伤迹象（称为白质高信号）可能与血管危险因素、大脑萎缩和其他痴呆症标志物有更密切的联系，如脑部扫描所示。 ，根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志 Neurology® 在线期刊 2023 年 12 月 20 日发表的一项研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Football-linked-to-more-brain-damage-beyond-white-matter-marks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Football-linked-to-more-brain-damage-beyond-white-matter-marks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30ad3a5a-7ff2-4f88-80ac-0dd4688784f9 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:52:00 -0500 Football linked to more brain damage beyond white matter marks
